data.message: Unfortunately the word friend is use way to often, I have a few associates on my Facebook page and I have a few high school friends about 20 altogether. To me a friend is someone you can tell your deepest darkest secret and she won't go tell anyone else and she won't look down  on u,she has your back when you need her and you have hers. You can call her at any other time of the night and she'll be there for you.
